alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Logan; Payne (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 4:42AM CDT until July 21 at 5:30AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Lincoln County in central Oklahoma... East central Logan County in central Oklahoma... Payne County in central Oklahoma... * Until 530 AM CDT. * At 442 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles north of Stillwater to 6 miles northwest of Perkins to 5 miles east of Guthrie, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Stillwater, Cushing, Perkins, Langston, Yale, Glencoe, Tryon, Ripley, Agra, Coyle, Meridian, Quay, Avery, Ingalls, and Parkland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
